articles.content: On Thursday, with the siblings still nowhere to be found, their mother was arrested in Princeville, Hawaii. The 46-year-old woman was charged with two counts of felony desertion of a child, along with misdemeanor charges of resisting and obstructing an office… [+6528 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Iran reports another death, 10 new cases of new coronavirus
articles.description: Iranian health authorities are reporting another death from the new virus that emerged in China, bringing the death toll in Iran to five
articles.content:
The deaths came as Iranians voted in nationwide parliamentary elections Friday. Many voters went to the polls wearing face masks, and some pharmacies ran out of masks and hand sanitizer amid the election-day rush.
Jahanpour said that of the 10 newly detected… [+1396 chars]

articles.author: Anna Fifield
articles.title: WHO experts head to Wuhan, epicenter of the coronavirus outbreak, as cases continue to climb
articles.description: The "nationwide inflection point" in the epidemic has not yet arrived, China's leaders say.
articles.content:
Chinese leader Xi Jinping heard that the situation in Wuhan remains remains grim and complex.
South Korea and Japan both reported a sharp spike in cases Saturday, with the total number of infections rising to 346 and 111 respectively.
China reported only 39… [+8121 chars]

articles.title: Iran's hard-liners take early lead in Tehran after vote
articles.description: Iranian state TV is announcing the first partial results from the country's parliamentary elections
articles.content:
Although the final tally was still not released, a lower-than-usual turnout would signal widespread dissatisfaction with the state of the economy and the ways in which the government has handled a range of crises.

articles.author: Mari Yamaguchi | AP
articles.title: Japan's emperor turns 60, offers sympathy to virus patients
articles.description: Japanese Emperor Naruhito, marking his 60th birthday, has offered his sympathy to those affected by the new virus that emerged in China and said he hopes to see the outbreak contained soon
articles.content:
Festivities surrounding the emperors birthday, however, have been toned down amid concerns about the virus.
Japan has confirmed more than 750 cases, including 634 from the Diamond Princess cruise ship, which was docked and quarantined in Yokohama, near Tokyo… [+2264 chars]
